typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber as string,
		ProviderName as string,
		TradingName as string,
		ProviderStatus as string,
		ProviderType as integer,
		ProviderContact as (ContactType as string, ContactAddress as (SAON as (Description as string), PAON as (Description as string), StreetDescription as string, UniqueStreetReferenceNumber as string, Locality as string, Items as string[], ItemsElementName as string[], PostTown as string, PostCode as string, UniquePropertyReferenceNumber as string), ContactPersonalDetails as (PersonNameTitle as string, PersonGivenName as string, PersonFamilyName as string, PersonNameSuffix as string, PersonRequestedName as string), ContactRole as string, ContactTelephone1 as string, ContactTelephone2 as string, ContactFax as string, ContactWebsiteAddress as string, ContactEmail as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		ProviderVerificationDate as string,
		ProviderVerificationDateSpecified as boolean,
		ExpiryDateSpecified as boolean,
		ProviderAssociations as string,
		ProviderAliases as (ProviderAlias as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		VerificationDetails as (VerificationAuthority as string, VerificationID as string)[],
		DateUpdated as string,
		DateDownloaded as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document') ~> Providers
FilterOutApprenticeshipProviders foldDown(unroll(ProviderContact),
	mapColumn(
		ProviderUkprn = UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber,
		ProviderName,
		TradingName = TradingName,
		ContactType = ProviderContact.ContactType,
		ContactAddress = ProviderContact.ContactAddress,
		ContactPersonalDetails = ProviderContact.ContactPersonalDetails,
		ContactRole = ProviderContact.ContactRole,
		ContactTelephone1 = ProviderContact.ContactTelephone1,
		ContactTelephone2 = ProviderContact.ContactTelephone2,
		ContactWebsite = ProviderContact.ContactWebsiteAddress,
		ContactEmail = ProviderContact.ContactEmail
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenContactDetails
SortByUkprn split(ContactType == "P",
	ContactType == "L",
	disjoint: false) ~> splitContactTypes@(Primary, Legal)
Providers filter(ProviderType != 2) ~> FilterOutApprenticeshipProviders
FlattenContactDetails sort(asc(ProviderUkprn, true)) ~> SortByUkprn
splitContactTypes@Legal, splitContactTypes@Primary exists(splitContactTypes@Legal@ProviderUkprn == splitContactTypes@Primary@ProviderUkprn,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BackfillLegalContacts
splitContactTypes@Primary, BackfillLegalContacts union(byName: true)~> UnionProviders
UnionProviders derive(ContactAddress1 = concat(
    iif(!isNull(ContactAddress.SAON.Description), ContactAddress.SAON.Description + " ", ""), 
    iif(!isNull(ContactAddress.PAON.Description), ContactAddress.PAON.Description + " ", ""),
    ContactAddress.StreetDescription
),
		ContactAddress2 = ContactAddress.Locality,
		ContactTown = iif(!isNull(ContactAddress.PostTown), ContactAddress.PostTown, ContactAddress.Items[0]),
		ContactPostcode = ContactAddress.PostCode,
		ContactPhone = iif(!isNull(ContactTelephone1), ContactTelephone1, ContactTelephone2)) ~> CreateContactColumns
CreateContactColumns sink(input(
		ProviderUkprn as string,
		ProviderName as string,
		TradingName as string,
		ContactAddress1 as string,
		ContactAddress2 as string,
		ContactTown as string,
		ContactPostcode as string,
		ContactWebsite as string,
		ContactEmail as string,
		ContactPhone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['providers.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		ProviderUkprn,
		ProviderName,
		TradingName,
		ContactAddress1,
		ContactAddress2,
		ContactTown,
		ContactPostcode,
		ContactWebsite,
		ContactEmail,
		ContactPhone
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	quoteAll: true) ~> exportProviders
